name: Transformation
description: Ronald Tobias's archetypal plot where a character undergoes fundamental change
distribution_philosophy: Based on Tobias's transformation structure emphasizing the gradual change process and pivotal moments

status_quo.name: Status Quo
status_quo.description: The character exists in their current state, unaware of the need for change

catalyst.name: Catalyst
catalyst.description: An event or realization triggers the need for transformation

resistance.name: Resistance
resistance.description: The character struggles against the change, clinging to old ways

experimentation.name: Experimentation
experimentation.description: The character begins to try new approaches and behaviors

crisis.name: Crisis
crisis.description: A major test determines whether the transformation will succeed

new_equilibrium.name: New Equilibrium
new_equilibrium.description: The character emerges transformed, having integrated the change
